name: JSManagedValue
desc: A JavaScript value with conditional retain behavior to provide automatic memory management.

items.name: init!(value: JSValue!)
items.desc: Initializes a managed value with the specified JavaScript value.

items.name: init!(value: JSValue!, andOwner: Any!)
items.desc: Creates a managed value and associates it with an owner.
